Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summon a servant. The servant will grant beneficial effects while following its master. The number of buffs increases proportionally to the level of [Summon Servant].
Effect: Applies up to #{CaptionRatio}# times{nl}1st effect [+ AoE attack ratio]{nl}2nd effect [+ SP recovery speed]{nl}3rd effect [STA recovery]{nl}4th effect [+ Magic Defense]{nl}5th effect [+ Dark property attack]{nl}Consumes Empty Spellbook x#{SpendItemCount}#
Effect_SpendItemCount: ["var count = skill.SpendItemBaseCount", "var addCount = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "return count + addCount;"]
Name: Summon Servant
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summons the demon from the secondary card equipped on the Grimoire to attack enemies. The damage inflicted is increased in proportion to the caster's SPR. The Evocation buff is applied to the demon created by Summoning when damage is dealt with Evocation, causing it to ignore 20% of enemy physical/magic defense.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Evocation Buff Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Sorcerer12\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Sorcerer12\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Reduces skill casting time. The reduced casting time will not surpass 90% of the original casting time.
Effect: Casting Time: -#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Duration: 30 minutes
Name: Quick Cast
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Releases evil energy into your opponent. The corpse parts of monsters affected by the evil energy can be collected once defeated.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Necromancer11\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Necromancer11\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Gather Corpse

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Create a Shoggoth with stats based on the cards that are placed in the Necronomicon. Only Beast, Plant and Mutant-type cards can be placed in the Necronomicon.
Effect: Shoggoth Damage: +#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Shoggoth Defense: +#{CaptionRatio2}#%{nl}Consumes Corpse Parts x#{CaptionTime}#{nl}Duration: 600 seconds

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Throw corpse parts on a targeted area to attack nearby enemies. Affected enemies receive the Necromancer Bane debuff.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x 16{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#{nl}#{CaptionRatio2}#% chance of applying 5 stacks of Necromancer Bane{nl}Consumes Corpse Parts x#{CaptionRatio}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Necromancer12\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Necromancer12\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Flesh Cannon
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Explodes an item registered in the Alchemy Workshop to damage nearby enemies.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Targets: 5
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Alchemist11\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Alchemist11\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Effect: Stats gained vary from weapon to weapon{nl}Max. level 1
Name: Item Awakening
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, \"Thaumaturge_Reversi\");", "var coolDownClassify = null", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isMap = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (basicCoolDown < skill.MinCoolDown) {", "    return skill.MinCoolDown;", "}", "", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"FIX\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown + basicCoolDown", "}", "", "return basicCoolDown;"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Soul]{/}{/}{nl}Concentrate magic energy and fire it at enemies.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x 2
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Alchemist9\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Alchemist9\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Alchemistic Missile

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Sprinkle an HP Potion registered in the Alchemy Workshop around to restore your HP and that of your party members. You can only register Alchemist-made potions.
Effect: Recovery: #{CaptionRatio}#
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var numberArg1 = 395 // @rjgtav. using Lv 15 Condensed HP Potion", "var hpValue = numberArg1 * 7", "hpValue = hpValue * 8", "var sprinkleHP = hpValue * (skill.Level * 0.1)", "return sprinkleHP;"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Causes Beast, Devil and Insect-type monsters or enemies under the [Curse] debuff to [Bleed]. Bathing in the blood from the targetted enemy recovers the caster's HP.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Bleeding]{/}{/} Duration: 7 seconds{nl}Recovery: #{CaptionRatio2}#% of Magic Attack
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Featherfoot3\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Featherfoot3\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Blood Bath
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, \"Thaumaturge_Reversi\");", "var coolDownClassify = null", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isMap = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (basicCoolDown < skill.MinCoolDown) {", "    return skill.MinCoolDown;", "}", "", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"FIX\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown + basicCoolDown", "}", "", "return basicCoolDown;"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Drains and gains HP from Beast, Devil, Insect-type enemies and enemies under the [Curse] debuff.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% per 0.4 seconds{nl}SP Consumption: #{CaptionTime}# SP per 0.4 seconds{nl}Recovery: #{CaptionRatio2}#% of damage
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Featherfoot4\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Featherfoot4\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Summon a carved, pointed bone called a 'Kundela'. The Kundela points towards enemies in range, cursing them with Lv 1. Hexing.

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Put on shoes made of mixed hair and blood. Walk while leaving bloody footprints on the ground, dealing damage to any enemies that come into contact with them.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Blood's Footprint duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds{nl}Movement speed reduced by -#{CaptionRatio2}#
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 15", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Featherfoot14')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = 5", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Featherfoot22\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Featherfoot22\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Kurdaitcha
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (basicCoolDown < skill.MinCoolDown) {", "    return skill.MinCoolDown;", "}", "", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"FIX\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown + basicCoolDown", "}", "", "return basicCoolDown;"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Use the Kundela to attack enemies.{nl}{#00113F}If the skill hits an Ice Wall, the wall releases ice fragments.{/}
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Targets: 10{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Curse]{/}{/}Increases damage against debuffed enemies by 100%

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}For a brief period of time, your character levitates. While levitating, you are immune to melee attacks but receive additional damage from missile attacks.{nl}{#00113F}When an Upper Level magic circle is beneath you, you levitate higher.{/}
Effect: Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds{nl}Receive additional damage from missile attacks
Name: Levitation

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Sacrifices the caster's own blood to deal additional damage to enemies and put them under [Cursed by Blood] debuff. Enemies under [Cursed by Blood] have their SP recovery reduced to 0 and heals the attacker's HP when attacked. Casting Blood Curse while low on HP could make you incapable of combat. Blood Curse can only be used while in Levitation and additional damages from skill does not take into account the target's defense.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Additional damage: #{CaptionRatio}#% of maximum HP x #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}[Cursed by Blood] duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 60", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Featherfoot12')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = 40", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 7 + 0.5 * skill.Level", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Featherfoot12')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + abil.Level * 7", "}", "", "return value;"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Temporarily inflicts a curse spell on enemies within range to cause additional damage when hit. The additional damage is calculated using the Featherfoot's magic attack and Enervation skill factor.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Applies 15 times{nl}Duration: 30 seconds
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Featherfoot20\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Featherfoot20\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summon evil spirits periodically or from fallen enemies. The summoned spirits remain in the field to await your orders. Up to 10 spirits can be summoned. [Evil Sacrifice] can be used to target enemies for the spirits to attack. [Evil Sacrifice] can be used to select a target for the spirits to attack.

Effect: Spirit Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Spirit Duration: 30 seconds{nl}30% increased damage against blinded enemies
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 1", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Warlock18\");", "", "if (abil != null  &&  TryGetProp(abil, \"ActiveState\") == 1) {", "    value = value * 2", "}", "", "return value;"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Warlock7\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Warlock7\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Dark Theurge
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, \"Thaumaturge_Reversi\");", "var coolDownClassify = null", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isMap = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (basicCoolDown < skill.MinCoolDown) {", "    return skill.MinCoolDown;", "}", "", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"FIX\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown + basicCoolDown", "}", "", "return basicCoolDown;"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Lays a curse upon enemies. Enemies under [Stigma] debuff will attack the caster at higher priorities and summoned Evil Spirits will attack the enemies under debuff when using Evil Sacrifice.{nl}{#00113F}Enemies suffering from [Stigma] receive additional damage from Holy-property attacks.{/}
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}[Stigma] Duration: 20 seconds{nl}30% increased damage against blinded enemies

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Make the summoned Evil Spirits follow the summoner in a line. The increase in damage will continue for a 3 second duration after channeling ends.

Name: Ghastly Trail

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Create a magic circle in front of you that summons the demon's arm. The summoned demon disappears after attacking forwards.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Increases damage against enemies under [Blind] debuff by 30%
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Warlock15\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Warlock15\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Demon Scratch
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, \"Thaumaturge_Reversi\");", "var coolDownClassify = null", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isMap = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (basicCoolDown < skill.MinCoolDown) {", "    return skill.MinCoolDown;", "}", "", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"FIX\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown + basicCoolDown", "}", "", "return basicCoolDown;"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Inflicts powerful damage to enemies in a targeted area. The attacked enemies reflect magic on other enemies, dealing additional damage to them and reducing their magic defense.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Magic DEF: -#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Casting time: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Consumes Rune Stone x1
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 2", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Runcaster_Casting_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var castingBuffOver = GetBuffOver(pc, \"Runcaster_Casting_Buff\")", "    value = 1", "", "    if (castingBuffOver == 2) {", "        value = 0.5", "    }", "", "}", "", "return value"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"RuneCaster3\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"RuneCaster3\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Turn you or an ally into a giant. Giant players are considered Large-type and have their HP and defense increased.{nl}{#00113F}If there is a Shoggoth among your summons when using this skill, the Shoggoth will also receive the effects of Rune of Giants for 30 seconds.{nl}Appiles a chance to cast Earthquake when performing jumping attacks while turned into a giant (Basic attack damage is applied when the caster has not learned the Earthquake skill).{/}Buff skills can be used while attack skills cannot. But the following skills can be used.{nl}Swash Buckling, Energy Bolt, Lethargy, Magic Shield, Earthquake, Magic Missile, Quick Cast, Creeping Death Charm, Storm Calling, Rune of Ice, Rune of Destruction, Rune of Justice, Rune of Protection, Rune of Rock
Effect: Giant Size Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Defense, Maximum HP: +#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Movement Speed: +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Consumes Rune Stone x1

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Charges a divine magic attack that is unleashed in a straight line.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x5{nl}Casting time: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Consumes Rune Stone x1
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 2", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Runcaster_Casting_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var castingBuffOver = GetBuffOver(pc, \"Runcaster_Casting_Buff\")", "    value = 1", "", "    if (castingBuffOver == 2) {", "        value = 0.5", "    }", "", "}", "", "return value"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"RuneCaster5\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"RuneCaster5\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Rune of Justice
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Applies an effect that reduces the damage you receive while casting skills.
Effect: Damage received while casting: -#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# minutes{nl}Casting time: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Consumes Rune Stone x1
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"RuneCaster10\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"RuneCaster10\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = skill.Level * 2", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill);", "return value;"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 30;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'RuneCaster11')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = 5", "}", "", "return value;"]

If a location is being saved, it records the coordinates of your current position before going on cooldown, you must wait for the cooldown to end before you are then able to open a portal.
Effect: Saveable Portals: #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Portal Cooldown: #{CaptionTime}# minutes{nl}Portal Duration: 15 seconds
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 3", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Sage1\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + abil.Level", "}", "", "return value;"]
Name: Portal
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, \"Thaumaturge_Reversi\");", "var coolDownClassify = null", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isMap = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (basicCoolDown < skill.MinCoolDown) {", "    return skill.MinCoolDown;", "}", "", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"FIX\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown + basicCoolDown", "}", "", "return basicCoolDown;"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Distorts the space into a small size to deal damage to enemies.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Sage2\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Sage2\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Effect: Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
Name: Missile Hole
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (pc == null) {", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (TryGetProp(skill, \"ClassName\", \"None\") == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "    var jobHistory = '';", "", "    if (IsServerObj(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (IS_PC(pc) == true) {", "            jobHistory = GetJobHistoryString(pc);", "        }", "", "    } else {", "        jobHistory = GetMyJobHistoryString();", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_2\") != null) {", "        value = value - 25", "    }", "", "", "    if (jobHistory != null  &&  string.find(jobHistory, \"Char4_10\") != null) {", "        value = value - 50", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Oracle_TwistOfFate\"  && ", "    (GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_1\"  ||  GetZoneName(pc) == \"guild_agit_extension\")) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, \"Thaumaturge_Reversi\");", "var coolDownClassify = null", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isMap = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isMap, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\")", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (basicCoolDown < skill.MinCoolDown) {", "    return skill.MinCoolDown;", "}", "", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"FIX\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    basicCoolDown = zoneAddCoolDown + basicCoolDown", "}", "", "return basicCoolDown;"]
Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Set up a Portal Shop. By learning the Portal skill, allies can move to locations that you have saved.
Effect: Up to 3 saved locations may be used
Name: Portal Shop

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Compresses the space around a single enemy, dealing damage. The longer the skill is charged, more damage is dealt. Nearby enemies are pulled in.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x 4{nl}Maximum Charge Time: 2 seconds{nl}Damage can be increased by up to 2x{nl}Gathers a maximum of 15 enemies
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Sage10\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Sage10\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Summons a hole on the ground that inflicts the [Blind] debuff on enemies. When the hole dissipates, enemies within range receive damage.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Magic Circle Duration: 3 seconds{nl}Targets: #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Blind duration: 15 seconds
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Sage15\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Sage15\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
