Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Slash] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Conceal yourself and quickly slash nearby enemies. You become invincible while the skill is being used.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x 14{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Assassin15\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Assassin15\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Annihilation
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, skill.ClassName);", "var coolDownClassify = null;", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isKeyword = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"PVP_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"Fix\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown + ret", "}", "", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}Throw sand at your enemy's eyes. Attacked targets become silenced and blinded and have their accuracy and evasion reduced.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#{nl}[Blind] Duration: 10 seconds{nl}Blinded Enemies: -20% accuracy and evasion{nl}[Silence] Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Outlaw1\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Outlaw1\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Outlaw2\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    skill.SklSR = 17", "}", "", "var value = pc.SR + skill.SklSR;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1", "}", "", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Use your street smarts and vast combat experience to increase your evasion. Evading an enemy attack during Bully increases the enemy's threat values.
Effect: Evasion: +#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Threat Value: +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var minSubPATK = pc.MINPATK_SUB", "var maxSubPATK = pc.MAXPATK_SUB", "var patkValue = Math.floor((minSubPATK + maxSubPATK) / 2)", "var hateValue = patkValue * (skill.Level * 0.02)", "return Math.floor(hateValue);"]
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 60", "var Outlaw19_abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Outlaw19')", "", "if (Outlaw19_abil != null  &&  1 == Outlaw19_abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = 20", "}", "", "return value"]
Name: Bully

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Strike] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Release all your pent-up aggression and go on a full rampage, destroying everything around you. You are able to dodge enemy attacks, except for the attacks that cannot be dodged. Attacks to stunned, blinded and bleeding enemies deal less damage but apply as two consecutive hits. After Rampage, a buff is applied that increases the damage you deal and receive. During this buff, you cannot evade enemy damage.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x 9{nl}Effects to stunned, blinded or bleeding enemies:{nl}- Damage -30%{nl}- Applies 2 hits{nl}Post-Rampage Buff Duration: 5 seconds{nl}Damage Dealt w/ Buff: +50%{nl}Damage Taken w/ Buff: +50%
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Outlaw15\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Outlaw15\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Rampage

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Set up a base camp for party members. Party members can use the base camp to gain buffs and access to storage.{nl}Party members will also be able to teleport to the Base Camp when in the same map as the Camp.{nl}The storage can be accessed without the Squire being present at the location of the Base Camp.{nl}Leaving the map or leaving the party will erase the buffs you have received from the Base Camp.
Effect: EXP Gains: +30%{nl}#{CaptionRatio2}#% chance to nullify equipment durability consumption{nl}Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# hours
Name: Base Camp
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Name: Refreshment Table

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Slash] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Slashes multiple times in front of you.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x 3{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Squire11\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Squire11\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Opens a shop to process weapons and armor, temporarily increasing their abilities. Armor upgrades are for top, bottom and shield items only. Shop prices increase when installed in a dungeon map.

Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 2500 + skill.Level * 250 + pc.INT", "var Squire3 = GetAbility(pc, 'Squire3');", "", "if (Squire3 != null  &&  1 == Squire3.ActiveState  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value + Squire3.Level * 20", "}", "", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Place a flag that raises the combat abilities of the pirate crew. A combo is activated if multiple enemies are defeated near the Jolly Roger. Achieving a combo of 100 activates a fever buff that grants additional damage.
Effect: Flag Duration: 30 seconds{nl}Damage: +#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Fever Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Corsair20\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Corsair20\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = (skill.Level * 2)", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill);", "return value;"]
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 10", "var abil1 = GetAbility(pc, 'Corsair27')", "var abil2 = GetAbility(pc, 'Corsair28')", "", "if (GetSkill(pc, 'Thaumaturge_SwellHands') != null  &&  abil1 != null) {", "    value = value + 25", "}", "", "", "if (GetSkill(pc, 'Enchanter_OverReinforce') != null  &&  abil2 != null) {", "    value = value + 25", "}", "", "return value;"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Strike] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Drag and pull enemies captured with Iron Hook. The enemy receives damage each time they are pulled. Dragged enemies are afflicted with the [Silence] debuff.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x2{nl}[Silence] Duration: 1 second
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Corsair11\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Corsair11\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, skill.ClassName);", "var coolDownClassify = null;", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isKeyword = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"PVP_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"Fix\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown + ret", "}", "", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Gun]{/}{/}{nl}Repeatedly shoot your pistol subweapon at enemies in front of you to deal damage. Quick and Dead attacks gain a 15% chance to land as critical attacks.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x6
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Corsair16\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Corsair16\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}Attack enemies in the area nearby by exploding the gunpowder you have. Using this technique may cause you to become incapable of combat if your HP is too low. You enter stealth status when you reappear, and Bunshin no Jutsu will be canceled when clones mimic the skill.{nl}{#00113F}Mijin no Jutsu applies as 2 consecutive hits against enemies under the effect of Hallucination Smoke.{/}
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Consumes #{CaptionRatio2}# HP{nl}[Stealth] Duration: 8 seconds{nl}Consumes Ninjitsu Bomb x5
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Shinobi3\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Shinobi3\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Mijin no Jutsu
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var Bunshin = GetSkill(pc, 'Shinobi_Bunshin_no_jutsu')", "    value = value + (value * (Bunshin.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Creates clones of yourself. The clones automatically attack nearby enemies and replicate any Shinobi attack skills you use. Whenever the clones replicate skills, SP consumption and cooldown increase according to your Bunshin no Jutsu skill level. Attributes do not apply to skills performed by clones.{nl}{#00113F}Clones are immune to knockbacks and knockdowns.{/}
Effect: Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds{nl}Summon #{CaptionRatio2}# clones{nl}Additional Cooldown{nl}[2 + 10% skill's cooldown] x Number of clones{nl}Additional SP Consumption [10% x Number of clones]
Name: Bunshin no Jutsu
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, skill.ClassName);", "var coolDownClassify = null;", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isKeyword = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"PVP_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"Fix\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown + ret", "}", "", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Counter-attack by tricking the enemy with a fake doll created from a log.
Effect: Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds
Name: Mokuton no Jutsu
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunsinCount = GET_BUNSIN_COUNT(pc);", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + (bunsinCount * 2000 + (basicCoolDown * (bunsinCount * 0.1)))", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Attack multiple enemies by continuously exploding the gunpowder you possess.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Consumes Ninjutsu Bomb x1
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Shinobi2\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Shinobi2\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Katon no Jutsu
SP: ["function SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill) {", "    var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "    var decsp = 0;", "    var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "    if (basicSP == 0) {", "        return 0;", "    }", "", "    var lv = pc.Lv", "    bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "    if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "    } else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "        bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "    }", "", "    var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "    var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "    var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "    if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "        decsp = value * zeminaSP", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "        var ratio = 0.25;", "        var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "        if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "            ratio = ratio + 0.25", "        }", "", "        decsp = value * ratio", "    }", "", "    value = value - decsp;", "", "    if (value < 1) {", "        value = 0", "    }", "", "", "    if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "        return 0", "    }", "", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "var value = SCR_Get_SpendSP(skill)", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var Bunshin = GetSkill(pc, 'Shinobi_Bunshin_no_jutsu')", "    value = value + (value * (Bunshin.Level * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"PVP_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"Fix\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown + ret", "}", "", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Enlarges the size of monsters. Increases the target's maximum HP by 2 times and doubles loot dropped.
Effect: Small-type-> Medium-type-> Large-type{nl}Targets: #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
Name: Swell Body
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Take ownership of a magic circle created by an enemy.
Effect: Changes an enemy's magic circle to friendly at a targeted area.{nl}Maximum Level: 1
Name: Reversi

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Enlarge the size of your and your party members' heads to momentarily increase looting chance. Looting chance increases the drop rate for unidentified equipment.
Effect: Looting Chance: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Duration: 30 minutes{nl}Consumes Magic Powder x#{SpendItemCount}#
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Thaumaturge15\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Thaumaturge15\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = skill.Level * 100", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill)", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SpendItemCount: ["var count = skill.SpendItemBaseCount", "var addCount = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "return count + addCount;"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Enlarge the size of your and your party members' hands to momentarily increase maximum physical and magic attack. Characters with a subweapon in their left hand have their subweapon attack increased. Those with a shield have their physical defense increased.{nl}{#00113F}Using Brick Smash under the Swell Hands buff removes the enemy's helmet.{/}
Effect: Maximum Attack: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Duration: 300 seconds{nl}Consumes Magic Powder x#{SpendItemCount}#
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Thaumaturge19\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Thaumaturge19\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var DEX = TryGetProp(pc, \"DEX\", 1)", "var value = 30 + ((skill.Level - 1) * 2) + ((skill.Level / 5) * (Math.pow((DEX * 0.8) ,  0.9)))", "value = Math.floor(value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill))", "return value;"]
Effect_SpendItemCount: ["var count = skill.SpendItemBaseCount", "var addCount = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "return count + addCount;"]

zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"PVP_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"Fix\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown + ret", "}", "", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Disconnect all links.
Effect: Disconnect all links at once.{nl}Maximum Level: 1
Name: Unbind
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Strike] - [Physical] - [Lightning]{/}{/}{nl}Connect to a single target and deliver Lightning damage. Cannot be used on multiple targets at a time. Can be canceled by the Unbind skill.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% per 0.5 seconds{nl}Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Linker18\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Linker18\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Electric Shock
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, skill.ClassName);", "var coolDownClassify = null;", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isKeyword = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"PVP_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"Fix\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown + ret", "}", "", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Applies a buff to your and your party members' boots which reduces stamina consumption and increases movement speed. The Agility buff does not apply to characters not equipping boots.
Effect: STA consumption: -#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Movement Speed: +3{nl}Duration: 30 minutes
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Enchanter10\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Enchanter10\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = skill.Level * 1", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill)", "return value;"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Grants a Lightning-property damage buff to you and your party members. Additional Lightning-property damage increases in proportion to the caster's DEX. Changes melee and missile attacks to Lightning property (when stacked with Silver Bullet, the Holy property from Silver Bullet takes precedence).
Effect: Lightning Property Additional Damage: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Duration: 30 minutes{nl}Consumes Enchant Rounds x#{SpendItemCount}#
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Enchanter11\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Enchanter11\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = 160 + ((skill.Level - 1) * 60) + ((skill.Level / 5) * (Math.pow((pc.DEX * 0.8) ,  0.9)))", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill)", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SpendItemCount: ["var count = skill.SpendItemBaseCount", "var addCount = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "return count + addCount;"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical] - [Earth]{/}{/}{nl}Enchant the armor of you and your party with the power of the land, granting the ability to block without having to wear shields.
Effect: Block chance: +#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Duration: 30 minutes{nl}Consumes Enchant Rounds x#{SpendItemCount}#
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Enchanter12\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Enchanter12\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = 5 + skill.Level * 2", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill)", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Strike] - [Physical] - [Lightning]{/}{/}{nl}Grants a temporary buff to oneself. Deals an additional Lightning-type attack when using basic attacks on enemies.
Effect: Additional Lightning Skill Factor: +#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Duration: 30 minutes
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Enchanter13\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Enchanter13\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Lightning Hands
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Applies a buff to your and your party members' gloves which increases accuracy. The Enchant Gloves buff does not apply to characters not equipping gloves.
Effect: Accuracy: +#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Duration: 30 minutes{nl}Consumes Enchant Rounds x#{SpendItemCount}#
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Enchanter9\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Enchanter9\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = 10 + (skill.Level * 2)", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill)", "return value;"]
Effect_SpendItemCount: ["var count = skill.SpendItemBaseCount", "var addCount = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "return count + addCount;"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Hide under the ground to conceal your body. When you reveal yourself, your enemies receive a critical attack.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Burrow Duration: 30 seconds{nl}When Burrow is canceled, the first attack dealt is critical
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Rogue20\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Rogue20\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x #{CaptionRatio2}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Schwarzereiter11\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Schwarzereiter11\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Concentrated Fire
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}When mounted, boosts you mobility to shoot the enemies rapidly. While Limacon effects are active, pistol attack becomes available.

Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 12;", "var lv = pc.Lv", "var bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "value = value * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilSchwarzereiter18 = GetAbility(pc, 'Schwarzereiter18');", "", "if (abilSchwarzereiter18 != null) {", "    value = value + 5;", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Schwarzereiter13\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Schwarzereiter13\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = 42 + ((skill.Level - 1) * 7);", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill);", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Gun]{/}{/}{nl}March forward while shooting, attacking enemies in front of you. Deals 30% additional damage to blinded enemies.{nl}(Does not allow for automatic weapon swap.)
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% per 0.2 seconds{nl}Targets: 15{nl}Duration: 5 seconds
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Schwarzereiter19\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Schwarzereiter19\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Name: Full Metal Jacket
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

CoolDown: ["var basicCoolDown = skill.BasicCoolDown;", "var abilAddCoolDown = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + abilAddCoolDown;", "var cls = GetClassList(\"SkillRestrict\");", "var sklCls = GetClassByNameFromList(cls, skill.ClassName);", "var coolDownClassify = null;", "var zoneAddCoolDown = 0;", "", "if (sklCls != null) {", "    var isKeyword = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Keyword\", null)", "", "    if (IsRaidField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsRaidField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"Raid_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    } else if (IsPVPField(pc) == 1) {", "", "        if (string.find(isKeyword, \"IsPVPField\") == 1) {", "            var addCoolDown = TryGetProp(sklCls, \"PVP_CoolDown\", null)", "            addCoolDown = StringSplit(addCoolDown, \"/\");", "            coolDownClassify = addCoolDown[1]; zoneAddCoolDown = addCoolDown[2];", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Cleric_Heal\") {", "", "    if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown + 28000", "    }", "", "}", "", "var laimaCoolTime = GetExProp(pc, \"LAIMA_BUFF_COOLDOWN\")", "", "if (laimaCoolTime != 0) {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * (1 - laimaCoolTime)", "} else if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'CarveLaima_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 1.2;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'GM_Cooldown_Buff') == 'YES') {", "    basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.9;", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'SpeForceFom_Buff') == 'YES') {", "", "    if (skill.ClassName != \"Centurion_SpecialForceFormation\") {", "        basicCoolDown = basicCoolDown * 0.5;", "    }", "", "}", "", "var ret = Math.floor(basicCoolDown) / 1000", "ret = Math.floor(ret) * 1000;", "", "if (coolDownClassify == \"Fix\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown;", "} else if (coolDownClassify == \"Add\") {", "    ret = zoneAddCoolDown + ret", "}", "", "return Math.floor(ret);"]
Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Take the weapon in your right hand and place it in your left, assuming a stance. Your basic attack changes and you become able to use Bullet Marker skills.{nl}(Does not allow for automatic weapon swap.)
Effect: Basic Attack Damage: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Basic attack changed{nl}Maximum Level: 5
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var sklFactor;", "sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "return Math.floor(sklFactor);"]
Name: Double Gun Stance

SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Gun]{/}{/}{nl}Fire 4 shots at a single target with pistols in both hands.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#% x 4{nl}Can be used after activating Double Gun Stance
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Bulletmarker5\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Bulletmarker5\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Strike] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Throws three molotovs towards a designated area to deal continuous damage to enemies.
Effect: Skill Factor: #{SkillFactor}#%{nl}Target: #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var value = skill.SklFactor + skill.SklFactorByLevel * (skill.Level - 1)", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Arditi2\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  \"Arditi2\" != 'None') {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "", "    value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "    if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "        var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "        var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "        if (hidden_abil != null) {", "            var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "            var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "            var add_value = 0;", "", "            if (abil_level == 10) {", "                add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "            }", "", "            value = value * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "        }", "", "    }", "", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: Tre Granate
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var decsp = 0;", "var bylvCorrect = 0", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "", "var lv = pc.Lv", "bylvCorrect = lv - 300", "", "if (bylvCorrect < 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 2.75 / 1000", "} else if (bylvCorrect >= 0) {", "    bylvCorrect = bylvCorrect * 1.25 / 1000", "}", "", "var value = basicSP * (1 + bylvCorrect)", "var abilAddSP = 0 // @rjgtav. Attributes aren't supported yet;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "value = Math.floor(value) + Math.floor(value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaSP = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_SP\");", "", "if (zeminaSP != 0) {", "    decsp = value * zeminaSP", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Gymas_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var ratio = 0.25;", "    var isDragonPower = GetExProp(pc, 'ITEM_DRAGON_POWER')", "", "    if (tonumber(isDragonPower) >= 1) {", "        ratio = ratio + 0.25", "    }", "", "    decsp = value * ratio", "}", "", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 0", "}", "", "", "if (skill.ClassName == \"Scout_Cloaking\"  &&  IsBattleState(pc) == 1  &&  (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  IsPVPField(pc) == 1)) {", "    return 0", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}The player injects a syringe on self to recover HP and STA.{nl}The HP recovered cannot exceed 50% of the player's maximum HP.
Effect: HP Recovery: #{CaptionRatio}#(Recovery rate reduced by #{CaptionRatio3}#){nl}STA Recovery: #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Consumes 1x Med Kit
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Arditi5\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Arditi5\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var value = skill.Level * 595", "value = value * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill)", "var mhp = TryGetProp(pc, \"MHP\", 0)", "", "if (value > mhp * 0.5) {", "    value =  Math.floor(mhp * 0.5)", "}", "", "return value"]
Effect_CaptionRatio3: ["function SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill) {", "    var addAbilRate = 1;", "", "    if (\"Arditi5\" != \"None\") {", "        var reinforceAbil = GetAbility(pc, \"Arditi5\")", "", "        if (reinforceAbil != null) {", "            var abilLevel = TryGetProp(reinforceAbil, \"Level\")", "            var masterAddValue = 0", "", "            if (abilLevel == 100) {", "                masterAddValue = 0.1", "            }", "", "            addAbilRate = 1 + (reinforceAbil.Level * 0.005 + masterAddValue);", "            var hidden_abil_cls = GetClass(\"HiddenAbility_Reinforce\", skill.ClassName);", "", "            if (abilLevel >= 65  &&  hidden_abil_cls != null) {", "                var hidden_abil_name = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"HiddenReinforceAbil\");", "                var hidden_abil = GetAbility(pc, hidden_abil_name);", "", "                if (hidden_abil != null) {", "                    var abil_level = TryGetProp(hidden_abil, \"Level\");", "                    var add_factor = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"FactorByLevel\", 0) * 0.01;", "                    var add_value = 0;", "", "                    if (abil_level == 10) {", "                        add_value = TryGetProp(hidden_abil_cls, \"AddFactor\", 0) * 0.01", "                    }", "", "                    addAbilRate = addAbilRate * (1 + (abil_level * add_factor) + add_value);", "                }", "", "            }", "", "        }", "", "    }", "", "    return addAbilRate", "}", "", "var addHP = skill.Level * 535", "addHP = addHP * SCR_REINFORCEABILITY_TOOLTIP(skill)", "var mhp = TryGetProp(pc, \"MHP\", 0)", "var value = addHP - Math.floor(mhp * 0.5)", "", "if (value < 0) {", "    value = 0;", "}", "", "return value"]
